actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit predispute arbitration agreements that force arbitration of disputes arising from private education loans, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ensuring Fair Legal Recourse for Private Student Loan Borrowers Act

summary.text:
Ensuring Fair Legal Recourse for Private Student Loan Borrowers Act 

This bill invalidates a predispute arbitration agreement if it requires arbitration of a dispute relating to a private education loan.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit predispute arbitration agreements that force arbitration of disputes arising from private education loans, and for other purposes.
